short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FUTURAMO Icons – The Invention in Icon Design

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FUTURAMO Icons is an advanced Iconography System used by UI/UX professionals, developers and marketers worldwide.

FUTURAMO Icons is a system of user interface icons with instant search and tools for size, color, style, swatches. The 16-style matrix makes the webapp unique. It is probably the most comprehensive, visually compatible, always expanding professional icon system in the world! And a perfect tool for UI/UX pros, designers, developers, creative, digital and interactive agencies. 2944 icons are completely free (184 ×16 styles) and 30 000+ icons are available in Pro version.


Unique 16-style matrix
The FUTURAMO User Interface Icon System offers a 4 × 4 grid 16-style matrix to choose from light to black and square to round icon styles.

Pixel perfect already at 16 px grid
Specifically crafted forms precisly fit the 16-pixel grid. Geometric perfection, clear and no nonsense forms. Very memorable and elegant style, based on sets of rules of proportions. The 16-pixel grid keeps the icon forms as memorable as signs.

Pick your color
RGB or HSV? CMYK or HEX? It’s all there! And you can add your colors to swatches if you want to use them more times in the future. 

Clipboard
Clipboard is a place where you can store chosen icons. You can use filters (size, color, style) on all the icons before downloading them. 

Icon formats 
FUTURAMO Icons offers vector, font and bitmap formats. Choose your workflow:
SVG, TEXT (SVG to be copied), PNG, Icon Webfonts, SVG Sprites, SVG Icon Sheets for AI 

Lots of contextual alternatives

All icons forever (royalty free)!
